name: Neon Rush (FenixDS)
description:
A small and simple endless runner set in a Synthwave/Cyberpunk setting where the goal is to jump, slide, destroy drones, slash bullets and always move right.

Made for the recruitment process of GameDev Técnico @ Instituto Superior Técnico

Game made using GameMaker Studio 2

Background Music - Bush Week by Nihilore

Sound Effects all taken from Zapsplat
